RelatedSentence: This month marks the 60th anniversary of the Brown vs. Board of Education Supreme Court decision , initiating efforts to integrate schools around the country and especially in the American South where black and white children received largely unequal opportunities for education .

This month marks the 60th anniversary of the Brown vs. Board of Education Supreme Court decision , initiating efforts to integrate schools around the country and especially in the American South where black and white children received largely unequal opportunities for education .
Without doubt , this policy shaped race relations in the city more fundamentally over the long - term , even up to the present day , than the short - term effects of the school crisis .
